channel.title: What does the Moderated symbol and warned symbol mean?
channel.description: What does the Moderated symbol and warned symbol mean? Its below their name when they make a reply/post. What does it mean?

item.title: What does the Moderated symbol and warned symbol mean?
item.dc:creator: @Syfal Syfal
item.description:
@Syfal wrote:

Warning means you have gotten a warning from a mod/admin about misconduct.

Moderated means that you are being watched by a mod to see if you misbehave.

Read full topic
item.source: What does the Moderated symbol and warned symbol mean?
